attributes.action: Cancel the 2012 London Olympics and spend the £10 billion on worthier causes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The money could be better spent on re-equipping the Royal Navy and other armed forces to protect our country against madmen such as Mahmood Ahmadinejad.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
